title: The Height of Tebowmania: Remembering the 2011 Broncos-Steelers Wild Card Game with Brady Quinn & Bryant McFadden
description:
Tim Tebow once was a part of one of the most spectacular plays in the NFL history. The moment is hard to forget. But in case you did or simply want a reminder of what epic football looks and sounds like, join us for this special episode of the Pick Six podcast as we revisit and re-live the 2011 Broncos vs. Steelers Wild Card Game that epitomized peak 'Tebowmania'. And get this...you'll hear in-depth memories from two players who were a part of that game and who just so happen to be two of our frequent podcast guests. Brady Quinn was Tebow's backup and Bryant McFadden was tasked with defending Tebow. Together, Brady and BMac discuss game preparation, playcalls, coverages and of course the unforgettable 80-yard game-winning connection between Tebow and Demaryius Thomas that sent the football world into a frenzy.
If this game brings up a sense of sports nostalgia, then you're in luck. On Saturday, April 18 at 10 pm ET, CBS Sports Network will be re-airing the 2011 Broncos vs. Steelers Wild Card matchup. And over the course of the week, CBSSN will be re-airing 14 classic NFL games in total. Tune in on the CBS Sports App or CBSSports.com by logging in with your provider.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @Brady_Quinn, @BMac_SportsTalk
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Height of Tebowmania: Remembering the 2011 Broncos-Steelers Wild Card Game with Brady Quinn & Bryant McFadden
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Tim Tebow may not have panned out in the NFL, but he'll always have that postseason game-winning TD pass to Demaryius Thomas. Join us on our journey back to Broncos-Steelers in the 2011 playoffs.
